articles.author: Devin Griffiths
articles.title: How 'Dune' became a beacon for the fledgling environmental movement, and a rallying cry for the new science of ecology
articles.description: "Dune," widely considered one of the best sci-fi novels of all time, continues to influence how writers, artists and inventors envision the future.
